audio

Class AudioHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • audio.AudioHandler

  • public class AudioHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all audio functionality for the game, including sound effects and music. It provides methods to play, loop, and stop various sound clips.
    Since:
    1.0

      • loadSoundClip

        private static city.cs.engine.SoundClip loadSoundClip(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads a sound clip from a file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the relative path to the audio file.
        Returns:
        SoundClip object or null if an error occurs.
